item.title: OpenAPI Automation Framework Support
item.description: OpenAPI Automation Framework Support This add-on supports the Automation Framework. The add-on will add OpenAPI definitions if they are found while spidering but adding them explicitly via a URL or local file is recommended if they are available. The targetUrl parameter works in the same way per ‘Target URL Format’.
